definition: to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops
supervisor of textiles (official post in Ming dynasty)

sentences.english: The web may be a combined effort of social cobweb spiders.
sentences.chinese: 巨型蜘蛛网可能是由群居的蜘蛛共同织造成。

sentences.english: The air jet weaving machine employs the air picking-up, its weaving technology consisting in small shedding and large tension.
sentences.chinese: 喷气织机采用气流引纬，其织造工艺为小开口大张力。

sentences.english: Therefore, the study on non-woven sound-absorbing materials has great significance.
sentences.chinese: 因此研究非织造吸声材料具有非常重大的意义。

sentences.english: Jinhongri knitting manufactory locates in Guangzhou, the delta hinterland along the pearl river.
sentences.chinese: 金红日织造厂位于珠江三角洲腹地的广州市。

sentences.english: This embroidery weaving system is aimed at producing fabrics for e. g. curtains and shirting.
sentences.chinese: 此台绣花织布机主要用于织造窗帘布和衬衫面料等。

sentences.english: The paper introduced the application of nonwoven fabric on agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 较详细地介绍了非织造布在农业上的应用现状。

sentences.english: Countryside silkmaking has changed little since Marco’s time.
sentences.chinese: 乡下的丝绸织造从马可时代开始改变很少。

sentences.english: The weaving performance of yarn is generally expressed in terms of warp breakage rate in weaving.
sentences.chinese: 经纱可织性一般用织造时的经纱断头率来表示。

sentences.english: The new and further developments of leno technique for jacquard and aims at extended use are described.
sentences.chinese: 描述了大提花纱罗织造技术的新进展和更广阔的应用。

sentences.english: This article mainly analyzes the influence of all kinds of factors on the physical properties and performances of PP spunbonded non-woven fabric.
sentences.chinese: 分析了各种对丙纶纺粘非织造布物理性能的影响因素。

sentences.english: Weaving technology show ingenuity, dyeing and finishing technology advanced.
sentences.chinese: 织造工艺别具匠心，染整技术先进。

sentences.english: A third form of weave is the satin weave .
sentences.chinese: 第三种织造形式是缎纹组织。

sentences.english: The creep strain of nonwoven geotextiles is measured by using the method of photic leverage.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用光杠杆法对非织造土工布蠕变量进行测试。

sentences.english: Warp-tying is another cost factor in the weaving mill.
sentences.chinese: 经纱接头是织造厂的另一个成本因素。

sentences.english: The creep property of nonwoven geotextiles is described well with the model.
sentences.chinese: 该模型可较好地描述非织造土工织物的蠕变性能。

sentences.english: Our company is engaged in the work of many years of rope weaving.
sentences.chinese: 本公司从事多年绳带织造工作。

definition: Jacquard weave (machine weaving leaving protruding pattern)
kesi or k’o-ssu, Chinese silk tapestry woven in a pictorial design
to spin synthetic fiber/to spin silk/spinning/filature
